title: Define MemoryBlockBase schema with `type` and `links`
goal: Establish the shared memory format for Dolt, LlamaIndex, and LangChain tools, supporting multiple block types and graph structure.
action_items: [ ] Define a Pydantic BaseModel named `MemoryBlock` (or `MemoryBlockBase`) based on `project.schemas.memory_block_pydantic`.
[ ] Include base fields: id, text, tags, source_file, source_uri, metadata.
[ ] Add new fields based on updates: `type` (e.g., 'knowledge', 'task', 'project'), `links` (List[str] of related block IDs), `confidence` (Optional[float], maybe separate human/ai later).
[ ] Ensure appropriate types (e.g., List, Optional) are used.
[ ] Add basic validation if needed (e.g., `type` is within allowed values).
test_criteria: Create and validate an instance with dummy data.
Instantiate each block type (e.g., 'knowledge', 'task') with appropriate metadata and links.
